mapper.insert: insert into DB_COM_USRAUT (UA_USID, UA_MNID, REMARKS, REG_USER_ID, REG_DTM, MOD_USER_ID, MOD_DTM, BKCK_FG) values (#{uaUsid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uaMnid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{regUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{regDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{bkckFg,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select UA_USID, UA_MNID, REMARKS, REG_USER_ID, REG_DTM, MOD_USER_ID, MOD_DTM, BKCK_FG from DB_COM_USRAUT
